argument.name: element
argument.description: A string with the ID or NAME of the element, a pointer to an HTML element, or an array of either of the previous.

argument.name: attribute
argument.description: A string or array of strings containing the attributes to set for the element(s).

argument.name: value
argument.description: A string or array of strings containing the values to assign the attributes specified in *[js:attribute]*.

page.description: The $sa() function sets an attribute or multiple attributes for a single element or multiple elements.

discussion.p: Behavior of arrays of elements or attributes is much the same as with the $ga() function.

see.ref: Using Core Library Functions in Components
